title: Drawing, Curtain Design for Ninette de Valois's Ballet, "Checkmate", 1937
title_raw: Curtain Design for Ninette de Valois's Ballet, "Checkmate"
medium: Brush and gouache over graphite on heavy white paper
signed: Lower right in white ink below inscription: "E.McKnight Kauffer"
provenance: Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer, from the artist's estate
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Vertical stripes of blue, green, yellow, orange, red and black with white, red and green triangles and groups of converging lines superimposed.  In the center, an orange diamond and three small gray cloud forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Curtain Design for Ninette de Valois's Ballet, "Checkmate", 1937. Brush and gouache over graphite on heavy white paper. 
Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-272
